imdb.plot outline: In ARE WE THERE YET? IRELAND, soap star Charlie Lawson "Coronation Street" and former Emmerdale actor Daniel Coll embark on an audacious vintage Land Rover road drive around Ireland - with no cash. Over their ten-day journey, they need to find creative ways to earn money to pay for fuel, food and lodging. As they do so, viewers experience the sights and sounds of the Emerald Isle in a completely unique way, with prominent Irish actors, musicians and local characters sharing their love of home. The penniless duo charm celebrity guests such as chef Rachel Allen, Dana and Sir James Galway as well as ordinary people into joining them for novelty fundraising ideas as well as conversation. In the end, they'll cover 2,400km of the most amazing Irish countryside, meeting some great folks and visiting historic sights on their way. And if they don't raise enough money - they sleep in the car.
imdb.title: Are We There Yet?
